greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of thrice-partitions of n.
comment: A thrice-partition of n is a choice of a twice-partition of each part in a partition of n. Thrice-partitions correspond to intervals in the lattice form of the multiorder of integer partitions.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3244
Gus Wiseman, The a(4) = 34 thrice-partitions of 4.
maple: b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0 or k=0 or i=1,
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Mar 24 2018
ext: a(0)=1 prepended by _Alois P. Heinz_, Jan 25 2019
